tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: Get a list of all files and folders in a specified directory

directory_path.description: The path to the directory to list contents from

tools.name: read_file_content
tools.description: Read and return the contents of a specified file

file_path.description: The path to the file to read

tools.name: search_in_directory
tools.description: Search for text within all files in a specified directory recursively

directory_path.description: The path to the directory to search in

search_query.description: The text to search for within the files

tools.name: create_scratch_pad
tools.description: Create a scratch pad file if it doesn't exist

tools.name: scratch_pad_read_all
tools.description: Read and return the complete JSON data stored in the scratch pad

tools.name: scratch_pad_update
tools.description: Update a single entry in the scratch pad JSON by specifying its ID

id.description: The unique identifier of the entry to update

updates.description: The key-value pairs to update in the entry

tools.name: scratch_pad_overwrite
tools.description: Completely overwrite the scratch pad JSON with a new JSON object when multiple keys need to be updated

new_data.description: The complete new JSON object to replace the scratch pad content

tools.name: deep_thinking
tools.description: Acts as a planning layer that analyzes user queries and chat history to provide strategic reasoning for response planning

user_query.description: The current user query that needs a planned response

chat_history.description: The previous chat conversation history as context for planning
